amendment.description: Amendment strengthens and reform the Iraq and Afghanistan Special Immigration Visa programs, and expresses the sense of the House that these programs are of significant importance to the US mission, and should be extended and reformed before their expiration.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 123 printed in Part B of House Report 113-108 to strengthen and reform the Iraq and Afghanistan Special Immigration Visa programs, and expresses the sense of the House that these programs are of significant importance to the US mission, and should be extended and reformed before their expiration.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A034) Agreed to by recorded vote: 420 - 3 (Roll no. 241).
